message:
Can you update  the .claude folder from walterAI to skynet basically copy and replace execpt for

TASK.md
OUTPUT.md
CLAUDE.md

can you also make the .claude folder  from Walter the default file have it as a project folder copy it into a area where relay can use for future projects that are created and copy it from there do not use the Walter as a default but create our own area for the dot clawed default folder  that gets copied to new projects the entire .claude folder 

if you need to update any files within the dot cord default folder system then please do so and let me know which ones to a report please 

this was supposed to happen but unfortunately there are some files missed in the Skynet job so we have to do this process let me know if you don't understand we're taking files from the copying files from Walter into Skynet except for task and output if you need to update any files in the default project

the goal is to update the Skynet .claude folder and have a default .claude that can be copied across to any future projects that get created

---
[AGENT MODE: Research] Use the Task tool with subagent_type="general-purpose" for deep research. Explore multiple angles and gather comprehensive information.

/orchestrate
